headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.gstatic.com https://*.dialogflow.com https://*.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.gstatic.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.supabase.co wss://*.supabase.co https://*.dialogflow.com https://www.googleapis.com https://*.googleapis.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.dialogflow.com; frame-ancestors 'self';
